mapper.select:
SELECT r.* FROM (SELECT r.rnum , r.image_data AS imageData , r.rtitle , r.rtext , r.rcount , date_format(r.rdatetime, '%c월 %d일') AS rdate , r.sigungu , a.unick AS userNick , r.rloc , case when now() < r.rdatetime and r.rcount > (select count(*) from rjoin where recruit_rnum = r.rnum) then '모집중' else '모집마감' end AS status , (select count(*) from scrap s where s.recruit_rnum = r.rnum and s.user_num = 1) AS scrapCount , r.user_num FROM recruit as r , account a WHERE r.user_num = a.unum ORDER BY r.rnum desc ) AS r WHERE 1 = 1
AND (r.rtitle like concat('%', #{searchword}, '%') or r.rtext like concat('%', #{searchword}, '%') or r.rloc like concat('%', #{searchword}, '%') )
AND r.status = '모집중'
AND r.scrapCount > 0

SELECT r.rnum , r.rphoto , r.image_data as imageData , r.rtitle , r.rtext , r.rcount , date_format(r.rdatetime, '%c월 %d일') as rdatetime , date_format(r.rdatetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as rdate , date_format(r.rdatetime, '%H:%i') as rtime , r.rloc , r.radrs , r.etc , a.unick as userNick , r.user_num as userNum , (select count(*) from rjoin where recruit_rnum = r.rnum) as joinCount , CASE DAYOFWEEK(r.rdatetime) WHEN '1' THEN '일요일' WHEN '2' THEN '월요일' WHEN '3' THEN '화요일' WHEN '4' THEN '수요일' WHEN '5' THEN '목요일' WHEN '6' THEN '금요일' WHEN '7' THEN '토요일' END as week , (select profile from myPage where user_num = a.unum) as profile , case when now() < r.rdatetime and r.rcount > (select count(*) from rjoin where recruit_rnum = r.rnum) then '모집중' else '모집마감' end as status FROM recruit as r , account as a WHERE r.user_num = a.unum AND r.rnum = #{rnum}
